pr_title: [Bug]Support get all rowset meta info in memory from tablet meta url

timeline.message: Support get all rowset meta info in memory from tablet meta url

timeline.bodyText:
Why are some rowset meta not in rocksdb but only in memory?
Is this part of rowset meta not effective?
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: this problem is introduced by #1946 , tablet will do meta checkpoint periodly
replies.author: caiconghui
